title: Lakers, Tom Brady, 76ers, conspiracy theories, and the Warriors
itunes:title: Lakers, Tom Brady, 76ers, conspiracy theories, and the Warriors
description:
Colin discusses the Los Angeles Lakers coaching search, why New England Patriots QB Tom Brady is special, why he enjoys watching the Philadelphia 76ers, conspiracy theories, and the Warriors-Rockets series. Guests include Chris Broussard, Albert Breer, Rob Parker, Chris Haynes, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
